append

public void append(TeilVektor t)
            throws java.rmi.RemoteException
Appends a TeilVektor. If it is already contained or null, nothing happens. Also size and sum informations are updated.

Specified by:
append in interface GesamtVektor
Parameters:
t - the TeilVektor to be appended.
Throws:
java.rmi.RemoteException

remove

public void remove(TeilVektor t)
            throws java.rmi.RemoteException
Removes a TeilVektor. If it is already contained or null, nothing happens. Also size and sum informations are updated.

Specified by:
remove in interface GesamtVektor
Parameters:
t - the TeilVektor to be removed.
Throws:
java.rmi.RemoteException
